name: Jewel Games 2018
description:
Infinitely Merge and Blast in this highly addictive Jewel Games 2018 now!

Welcome to the glorious jewel world! Magic power is now at your fingertips! Combine same blocks, get merged jewels, create beautiful diamonds and become the jewel star!

Bring your friends together to break records in this jewel quest! You can play with multicolored jewels anywhere without WIFI in this best jewel games.

---------------------------------------
HOW TO PLAY
- Drag and drop the jewel to the grid.
- Match 3 or more jewels in a row, you will get a merged jewel.
- Tap the jewel to rotate before dropping it.
- Get more merged jewels and create diamonds. Match 3 of them to get high scores.
- Unlimited crush and fun! Win the jewel star.
- Merge jewels reaching different level target. Get more rewards!

---------------------------------------
FEATURES OF BEST JEWEL GAMES
- Easy to learn and play.
- Suitable for all ages.
- No WIFI needed. You can play with jewels OFFLINE.
- Amazing sound and visual effects.
- No time limits in this jewel puzzle game.

---------------------------------------
EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to control, fun to play, great graphics!
- Just swap, match 3 in a row and get merged jewels with your single finger!
- You can use hammer to break the needless jewels.

Jewel Games 2018 is now available in App Store. Become a member of jewel games and win the jewel star now! If you have the highest score, your profile will be shown on the No. 1 place in the ranking list! Get as many merged jewels as you can. Jewel Games brings you challenging jewel quest in a leisure playing environment.

NOTES
